item.title: Deva add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "No human relation gives one possession in anotherâ€”every two souls are absolutely different. In friendship or in love, the two side by side raise hands together to find what one cannot reach alone." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Deva add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Deva add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "Trees are poems the earth writes upon the sky, We fell them down and turn them into paper, That we may record our emptiness." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Deva add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "The most pitiful among men is he who turns his dreams into silver and gold." -- Kahlil Gibran

item.title: Deva add a quote by Khalil Gibran
item.description: "For even as love crowns you so shall he crucify you. Even as he is for your growth so is he for your pruning. Even as he ascends to your height and caresses your tenderest branches that quiver in the sun, so shall he descend to your roots and shake them in their clinging to the earth." -- Khalil Gibran

item.title: Deva add a quote by Kahlil Gibran
item.description: "You give but little when you give of your possessions. It is when you give of yourself that you truly give." -- Kahlil Gibran
